attributes.action: Ban the reinvestigation of Col Jorge Mendonza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Col Jorge Mendonza has been cleared of charges of allowing his men to abuse prisoners in Iraq.  He has now resigned as there is the possibility that he can be the target of a fresh military enquiry, why when he has been cleared?  This should not happen.  He should be promoted and his resignation should not have been accepted
